description: Consists of: original animated scenes showing super-deformed versions of Rider, Saber, Sakura, and Saber Red commenting on past and upcoming Fate projects; preexisting (reused) animated scenes from various games and previous Fate anime; and the premiere of trailers for http://anidb.net/a10755 [Fate/stay night: Heaven`s Feel], http://anidb.net/a12046 [Fate/Extra: Last Encore], and http://anidb.net/a12704 [Fate/Apocrypha], which would later be added to their respective official websites.

titles.title: Fate Project New Year`s Eve Special: First & Next Order
Fate Project Oomisoka TV Special: First & Next Order
Fate Project 大晦日TVスペシャル: First & Next Order
